manstyle.para: The QCad Libraries are a collection of C++ libraries for Qt based CAD related applications.

The collection is divided into four modules:
qcadlib is the core library that contains the whole CAD engine and classes to create, modify and delete entities, layers and blocks (without user interaction).
qcadactions contains interactive classes for performing CAD operations.
qcadcmd is a small library that only contains the definitions of all command line strings. This library was only separated from the rest to allow the use a different translations for the command line than for the rest of the program.
qcadguiqt contains everything that has directly to do with the graphical user interface such as CAD specific widgets and dialogs.
